articles.title: "Have To Applaud...": Ravichandran Ashwin's Interesting Take On Steve Smith's "Non" Run Out - NDTV Sports
articles.description: The Day 2 of the ongoing second Ashes Test between England and Australia grabbed a lot of eyeballs after Steve Smith survived a close run-out call.
articles.content: The Day 2 of the ongoing second Ashes Test between England and Australia grabbed a lot of eyeballs after Steve Smith survived a close run-out call. Smith was clearly out of the crease when wicketkeep… [+2115 chars]

articles.title: FIFA Women's World Cup Sam Kerr fit to play against Canada Matildas - ESPN - ESPN
articles.description: Ahead of Australia's must-win clash with Canada, Matildas skipper Sam Kerr has been declared fit for selection on Saturday, after a calf injury ruled her out of the first two group stage games.
articles.content:
Jul 28, 2023, 10:59 PM ET
